p.span: The Colton Joint Unified School District is aware of the California Governors announcement today calling for the closure of public schools through the end of this school year.

We have also been working closely with our county superintendent and surrounding districts to move together as we follow the Governor's direction to remain closed through the end of this school year. The district will provide an update to families and employees as soon as possible, as we wait to receive more details from state and county authorities.

Please know regardless of these developments, our commitment to the education and wellbeing of our students is and will remain unwavering. We continue to move forward with our plans for distance learning and our chromebook distribution at schools, as well as student meal services for the coming weeks. Thank you so much for your continued patience, support and community spirit. It is truly appreciated.
El Distrito escolar unificado de Colton est al tanto del anuncio que dio hoy el gobierno de California, ordenando el cierre de las escuelas pblicas hasta el final del ao escolar.

Tambin hemos estado trabajando cercanamente con nuestro superintendente del condado y los distritos a nuestros alrededores para realizar la transicin juntos, a medida que seguimos la instruccin del gobierno de permanecer cerrados hasta el fin de este ao escolar. El distrito les proporcionar a las familias y empleados una actualizacin lo ms pronto posible, a medida que esperamos recibir ms detalles de las autoridades del estado y del condado.

Por favor sepa que, a pesar de los acontecimientos, nuestro compromiso sigue siendo y seguir firme a la educacin y bienestar de nuestros alumnos. Esperamos continuar con nuestros planes para el aprendizaje a distancia y nuestra distribucin de

en las escuelas, al igual que los servicios alimenticios de los alumnos durante las semanas por venir. Muchas gracias por su continua paciencia, apoyo y espritu comunitario. Sinceramente, se les agradece.

div.span: The District prohibits discrimination, harassment, intimidation and bullying based on actual or perceived race or ethnicity, gender/sex (including gender identity, gender expression, pregnancy, childbirth, breastfeeding, and pregnancy-related medical conditions) sexual orientation, religion, color, national origin, ancestry, physical or mental status, marital status, registered domestic partner status, age, genetic information, political belief or affiliation, a person's association with a person or group with one or more of these actual or perceived characteristics, or any other basis protected by federal, state or local law, ordinance, or regulation in any program or activity it conducts or to which it provides significant assistance. Title IX Compliance Officers: For Employees: Assistant Superintendent of Human Resources 1212 Valencia Dr. Colton, CA 92324 909-580-6691 For Students: Director of Student Services 325 N. Hermosa Ave Colton, CA 92324 909-580-6521
